/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with modern buildings, their facades predominantly red and gray, reflecting the urban landscape of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the buildings. In the distance, you can see trees and construction cranes, indicating ongoing development in the area. The image is bathed in the light of day, enhancing the colors and details of the scene.
